page.title: 08Glenco Products S.W.F.
page.content: Although most people in the new town of South Woodham Ferrers find work by commuting, about 5 years ago a factory estate was established. Many small products are produced, including patio doors and window frames, upholstery for furniture and labels. We visited Glenco Products, a plastics factory. They produce such things as flower pots, hanging baskets, dog and cat bowls and litter trays. Mr Ball, the managing director, employs 25 people who either work on the 13 machines, on packing or load- ing. They receive orders from nurseries, garden centres, Asda, Woolworths and pet shops. Orders come also from Holland, Switzerland and Finland. The business has increased greatly in five years and we liked the happy working atmosphere.
